column5: Oct 22 - Standard & Poor's Ratings Services today said its ratings on SunTrust Banks Inc. (BBB/Stable/A-2) are not affected by the bank's decent third-quarter results.  SunTrust generated adjusted pretax income of $13 million in the quarter  down  significantly from $362 million in the prior quarter.
